Package it.polimi.ingsw.distributed

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.Lobby
public class Lobby extends Object
Represents a lobby in the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • Lobby

      public Lobby(ServerImpl server, Client admin, String lobbyName) throws FullLobbyException, ClientAlreadyInLobbyException
      Constructs a new Lobby object with the given server, admin client, and lobby name.
      Parameters:
      server - the server implementation
      admin - the admin client
      lobbyName - the name of the lobby
      Throws:
      FullLobbyException - if the lobby is already full
      ClientAlreadyInLobbyException - if the admin client is already in a lobby

  • Method Details

    • addClient

      public void addClient(Client client) throws ClientAlreadyInLobbyException, FullLobbyException
      Parameters:
      client - the client that wants to join the lobby
      Throws:
      ClientAlreadyInLobbyException - if the client is already in the lobby
      FullLobbyException - if the lobby is full

    • getAdmin

      public Client getAdmin()
      Returns:
      the admin of the lobby

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns:
      the name of the lobby

      public ArrayList<Client> getInLobbyClients()
      Returns:
      the list of clients in the lobby

      public String getClientUsername(Client client)
      Parameters:
      client - the client whose username is requested
      Returns:
      the username of the client

    • getClientsUsernames

      public ArrayList<String> getClientsUsernames()
      Returns:
      the list of clients' usernames in the lobby

      Returns:
      the number of clients in the lobby

      Changes the number of players chosen for the game
      Parameters:

    • getController

      public GameController getController()
      Returns:
      the game controller

    • sendPlayersListToEveryoneBut

      public void sendPlayersListToEveryoneBut(String player, String content)
      Sends a list of players in the lobby to all clients except for one specified player.
      Parameters:
      player - the player to exclude from the client list
      content - the content to send to the clients along with the player list

    • sendToAll

      public void sendToAll(Message message)
      Sends a message to all clients in the lobby
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send

    • exitClient

      public void exitClient(Client client)
      Removes the given client from the lobby and notifies the other clients. If the client was the admin of the lobby and there are still other clients in the lobby, assigns a new admin to the lobby. If the client was the last one in the lobby, removes the lobby from the server.
      Parameters:
      client - the client to remove from the lobby

    • isGameStarted

      public boolean isGameStarted()
      Returns:
      true if the game has started, false otherwise

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Ends the game and removes the lobby from the server.

    • disconnectClient

      public void disconnectClient(Client client)
      Disconnects a client from the lobby.
      Parameters:
      client - the client to disconnect

    • reconnectClient

      public void reconnectClient(Client oldClient, Client client, String username)
      Reconnects a client to the lobby.
      Parameters:
      oldClient - the old client instance to be replaced
      client - the new client instance
      username - the new username for the client
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an error occurs during the reconnection process

    • containsAPlayerWithThisUsername

      public boolean containsAPlayerWithThisUsername(String username)
      Checks if the lobby contains a player with the given username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to check
      Returns:
      true if the lobby contains a player with the given username, false otherwise

    • onChatMessage

      public void onChatMessage(Client client, ChatMessage message)
      Handles a chat message sent by a client.
      Parameters:
      client - the client sending the chat message
      message - the chat message to handle
